name: KIPP San Francisco College Preparatory
description: College Preparatory Academics Our top-ranked KIPP high schools are known for excellent teachers and strong academic supports that prepare students for college, career, and beyond. All students have access to challenging coursework and best-in-class college counseling. Our unique KIPP Forward model supports students throughout high school as they choose their path after graduation. Students have access to structured support focused on college readiness and career exploration from day one. Service
